job.title: Elixir Software Engineer - Elixir, Elm, Graphql, PostgreSQL
job.description: If you are a Elixir Software Engineer with experience please read onbrbrWe are an environmental friendly company that works on a real time energy balancing platform We need an engineer to add new capacities to our Elixir control platformbrbrWhat You Need for this Positionbrulli 4 years of professional experiencelili Elixirlili Graphqllili PostgreSQLlili AWSlili ELMbrliulSo if you are a Elixir Software Engineer with experience please apply todaybrbrstronguEmail Your Resume In Word TobrbrustrongLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best way to apply but you may alsobrbrChrisCavishCyberCoderscombrulliPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way You must keep the JobID linkedin  CC181643092  in the email subject line for your application to be consideredbrliulChris Cavish  Recruiter  CyberCodersbrbrApplicants must be authorized to work in the USbrbrstrongCyberCoders Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity EmployerbrbrstrongAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin disability protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by lawbrbrstrongYour Right to Workstrong  In compliance with federal law all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hirebrbrCyberCoders will consider for Employment in the City of Los Angeles qualified Applicants with Criminal Histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of the Los Angeles Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring Ban the Box Ordinance
